description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in Microsoft WDAC OLE DB Provider for SQL Server (CVE-2024-21375), follow these steps to apply the necessary updates:

1. Identify your Windows version and build number from the list below:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.3155
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22621.3155
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22000.2777
   - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.10240.20469
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19045.4046
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19044.4046

2. Download the appropriate KB update for your system:
   - For versions related to KB5034765:
     [Download KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For versions related to KB5034766:
     [Download KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
   - For versions related to KB5034774:
     [Download KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)
   - For versions related to KB5034763:
     [Download KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)

3. Apply the update package to your system.

**Details**:
- The updates address the vulnerabilities causing potential remote code execution. 
- Ensure to verify the successful application of the updates by checking the system settings or update history. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system is compatible with the respective KB updates before installation.
- Backup important data before applying the updates.
